descriptionHtml:
\"Realistic Needs and Diseases\" Overhaul v0.2


I cannot speak English. Please forgive my poor English.

This MOD is Overhaul file for \"Realistic Needs and Diseases\".
I like \"Realistic Needs and Diseases\" very much.
But there are some places I want to the MOD improve. 
This is a reason I make this Overhaul MOD.


FEATURES:

1: \"Fish Soup\" recipes are sorted.
(Now you can make \"Fish Soup\" only by \"Silverside perch\".)

2:\"Water\" & \"Salt\" & recipes are hidden.
(If you have some kinds of bottlewater or waterskin
 you can show these recipes again.)
\"Salted Meat\" recipes are also hidden.
(If you have beef or venison or goat or horse meat
 you can show these recipes again.)

3:\"Beggar
 Soup\" & \"Charried Meat\'s\" recipes are purged.
Because my Dovahkiin(She is aristocratic lady!) dislike such foods.

4:Now you cannot eat flesh potato safety.
Flesh potato is a little poisonous food.(They categorization \"raw food\")

5:\"HerbalTea\"(include milk) is now named \"Milk Tea\".
\"Bread(Half Size)\" is now named \"Half Bread\".
Because It was confusing.

\"Pheasant stew\" is now named \"Pheasant Vegetable stew\".
\"Rabbit stew\" is now named \"Rabbit Herbal stew\".
Because it was duplicated with Cooking Expanded.

6: \"HerbalTea\" & \"MilkTea\"\'s recipes are changed.
They are cooked from new item \"TeaLeaf\".
You can cook \"TeaLeaf\" in cookingpot & stock it in your inventory.
(You must use some herbs to make it.)



MASTER FILES:

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
RealisticNeedsandDiseases.esp
author: SasameSnow
